Articles.Content:
You ever have those moments where you get an idea for a craft in KSP, and then your brain is on overdrive, and bothering you until you actually build the thing?  this happened to me this morning, and I had some commitments today so...I had trouble concentrating for a few hours.  When I get home, I fire up KSP and head into the SPH. 

I ended up with this thing (which flies awesome BTW, if a bit on the slow side):

...and which satisfied my itch too.  Any of you have similar?

Rather than individual craft I tend to have ideas for missions or career based themes, For example my latest career mode is being run entirely on probes with no manned craft.  This obviously greatly reduces my science gain per mission.
This sharing of a craft has been moved to the craft sharing subforum.
